com.citytechinc.cq.component.dialog.widget
Interface WidgetRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWidgetRegistry
public interface WidgetRegistry

The WidgetRegistry exposes lookup mechanisms for Widget definitions based on widget annotations.
